title: Does victory after defeat really exist? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not some one who came back from Death nor some one who is dead and still communicate wit the living. Best answer or correct answer can come From someone who came back from death. rest all assurances are fake.. you need to ask the guy assuring the proof.

Does victory after defeat really exist? ————-DEFEAT IS NOT THERE WHEN YOU FELL DOWN, BUT IT IS THERE WHEN YOU REFUSE TO GET UP.—————-                                           Thanks for watching, S N SHARMA JAIPUR
